title: Report: Galaxy S23 Ultra to adopt 200MP, Samsung-made camera sensor
content:
The Galaxy S21 Ultra and Galaxy S21 Ultra share one of the best camera arrays you can find on any smartphone today, but it seems Samsung is ready to change things up on the next generation. According to a new report, the Galaxy S23 Ultra will offer a 200MP camera sensor.

moreâ€¦

The post Report: Galaxy S23 Ultra to adopt 200MP, Samsung-made camera sensor appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: According to a new report, the Galaxy S23 Ultra will be Samsung's first smartphones to ship with a 200MP primary camera sensor.
